title: Reclaiming food and medicine
description:
Reclaiming Food and Medicine. Ending Corruption and Chronic Disease. Dr. Malhotra is at a conference in California, https://sanjosetheaters.org/event/reclaiming-food-medicine/
 if you are lucky enough to be able to attend in person. If not, here Aseem gives us potential life saving insights into the links between 'big food', ultra-processed food and our health.
